meanings.definition: A person who sits at the same table as another during a meal or event.
meanings.sent1: During the party, my tablemate and I chatted about our favorite foods.
meanings.sent2: At the wedding, my tablemate was a friendly stranger who shared stories with me.
meanings.sent3: My tablemate accidentally dropped a spoon in their soup, causing a small splash.
meanings.sent4: As my tablemate shared their dessert, I realized how sweet their personality was.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful laughter of my tablemate made the dinner experience enjoyable.
